title: Keyboard shortcuts
description:
Keyboard navigation:
- Arrow keys to move between cards
- Enter to open detail panel
- Escape to close panel
- 'a' to approve (when panel open)
- 'r' to reject (when panel open)
- '?' to show shortcuts help
acceptance_criteria:
- Arrow keys navigate cards
- Enter opens detail, Escape closes
- 'a' approves, 'r' rejects when panel open
- '?' shows help
